name: df-pmap
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cpmap, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ pmap =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0)| s2[(le ` s0)]s1 }))
comment: Define projective map for ` k ` at ` a ` . Definition in Theorem 15.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
